title: bhakti paNNAdirukkalAmO pADa onru
sahitya:
bhakti paNNAdirukkalAmO pADa enru oru nAkkum tALangaL pODa enru iru kaiyum
ADa enru iru kAlum koDuttirukka haTam koNDu migha dhiDam koNDu viTThalanai


anupallavi

  mukti pera shuka munivan bhAgavatam uNDu muzhudum kaDait-tEra bhImA nadiyum uNDu 
tittikkat-tittikkap-pADa viThala nAmam uNDu sEvikka pANDurangan sannidhiyum uNDu
				(madhyamakAla)
tirivadum poruLgaLai sErppadum pala vazhiyinil selavazhippadum virumbi adu pera
sila pala muraigaLai muyaluvadenbadu terinda kathai tAnE adu vara
urugiya manamoDu iru kara layamura uLamura viTThala jaya viTThala ena
ulagam Ezhum tozha padaviyAnadura-vuralumAm idugaL arivinAl uNarndu hari


caraNam    Eri shonna sirumadilum AghAyam parandadE erumaiyE sAma gAnam isaittE shirandadE 
bhUri shuDa viTThalan tanbura mudugu irundadE bhuvanamellAm pugazhum puNNiyamidu terindadE
				(madhyamakAla)
poyyA meyyA ena oru taram uNarndu pulanura viTThala enappADum
pOghaTTum nAn shonnadu palikkAviDil bhUvulagil endan pErai mAttippODum
uyyAdavan oruvarillai teriyAduLari shonnavar gati perap-pArum unakkum enakkum 
inda anratangam irukkaTTum uNmaiyAi umakkum oru namaskAram irukkaTTum hari
